Articles.Content:
GeneralMDBK gave me full permission to restart this challenge.

The challenge is simple but hard. You have to fly from the KSC runway to the old airfield/island runway, without going above 150 meters altitude. Post a screenshot of the F3 report and then you can get the above image on your signature.

No mods that control your plane are allowed.

Those who want to go there with low part counts will be added to the part count leaderboard.

There will also be a leaderboard for those who arrived the quickest.

You also must be able to take-off again.

Has to be manned.

Low Flyers:

1.Stank

2.The Rocketeer

3.

4.

5.

Lowest Part Count:

1.StanK

2.The Rocketeer

3.

4.

5.

Fastest:

1.StanK

2.

3.

4.

5.

My attempt:

Edited September 9, 2015 by Voyager275
Do we need to have it manned? And does able to take off mean needing fuel left over, or simply intact?

Well, stay low, cannot be that hard, can it?

Sure to do it won't be too hard, get there in time before the others eat all the snacks though...

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited September 9, 2015 by StanK

My entry. I didn't get an F3 at the island base, but I did after I'd returned to KSC - I guess that proves the plane was still flight capable.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Do we need to have it manned? And does able to take off mean needing fuel left over, or simply intact?

Intact, and yes

Well, stay low, cannot be that hard, can it?

Sure to do it won't be too hard, get there in time before the others eat all the snacks though...

http://i.imgur.com/drDF9rC.jpg

http://imgur.com/a/xZBGd

You have completed the challenge, congratulations.

My entry. I didn't get an F3 at the island base, but I did after I'd returned to KSC - I guess that proves the plane was still flight capable.

http://imgur.com/a/bjsE1

You have completed the challenge, congratulations

Edited September 9, 2015 by Voyager275
It's awesome seeing this challenge still going strong because of your interest to revive it Voyager.
